posts.name: Jamie Kyle
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.80.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • Signal polls are here! Are you and your friends on the same page, or are you poll-ar opposites? Polls are an easy way to see what your group chat really thinks. Create a poll with competing dinner options, vacation destinations, musical preferences for an upcoming road trip, or any other important choices. Everyone in the group can vote and see each other’s responses, and you can decide whether or not to allow multiple votes.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.79.0-beta.1…v7.80.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

New Version: 7.80.0-beta.1

46 new commits since 7.79.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.80.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Fix freeze in mute-state-change [2]

  • Refactor backup import/export options [3]

  • Fix lint [4]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7512] Improve copy-paste formatting inheritance [5]

  • Ensure reactions are handled in order [6]

  • Fix reply/quoting breaking for poll messages [7]

  • Disable redux action logging by default [8]

  • Add backup support for polls [9]

  • Use binary proto fields in staging [10]

  • Poll create modal [11]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.59.3 [12]

  • Allow poll questions to be searchable [13]

  • Prevent editing or forwarding polls [14]

  • Fix non-qualified emoji values rendering as emoji in composer [15]

  • Update to electron 39.0.0 [16]

  • Fix order of muteStateChange update [17]

  • Fix multiple choice polls to use unique voters as denominator [18]

  • ConversationController: Send changes to redux only if conversation in lookups [19]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.59.4 [20]

  • Fix spacing when a View Once message is viewed [21]

  • Update poll receive feature flags [22]

  • Chat folders: for unread, check setting and active notification profile [23]

  • Release notes for 7.79 [24]

  • Update strings [25]

  • Update DNS fallback [26]

  • Implement backup support for chat folders [27]

  • Add pending poll vote UI state [28]

  • Update electron to 39.1.2 [29]

  • Send and receive polls with latest protocol version [30]

  • Fix chat folder migration [31]

  • Add byte length checks to poll question and options during create [32]

  • Add ability for poll author to terminate a poll [33]

  • Poll notifications and read syncs [34]

  • Avoid orphaning quoted attachment thumbnails [35]

  • Simplify GumVideoCapturer [36]

  • Don't clear link preview on text selection [37]

  • Fix findStoryMessage for in-memory messages [38]

  • Expire poll terminate chat events [39]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7571] Fix duplicate word in bug report template [40]

  • Fix scrollbars for all macOS settings [41]

  • Update poll create placeholder text, fix test flake [42]

  • Downgrade electron to 39.1.1 [43]

  • Update release notes [44]

  • Update strings [45]

  • 7.80.0-beta.1 [46]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.79.0-beta.1…v7.80.0-beta.1

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Yay for Signal polls!

Nay for Signal crashing on first launch after showing a logo with a black background!

https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.80.0-beta.1/a47a1b3626663b02d82fe4cc58d0206b7477c6027fd53dffb56494fd81e541db.gz

posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked: @Whatnoww sorry about that . We are working on fixing the slowness of startup and the appearance of that loading screen, and we are investigating that crash. Is the app functioning fine since the crash?

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked: No unfortunately :( I think my backup won’t restore anymore, not sure if I should unlink or something? Otherwise it seems to be just fine?

New Version: 7.80.0-beta.2

  • Improve speed of getUnreadByConversationAndMarkRead query [1]

  • Fix loading screen theme [2]

  • Update electron to 39.2.0 [3]

  • Update strings [4]

  • 7.80.0-beta.2 [5]
